mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES (null, #{title}, #{contents}, #{hit}, date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') as reg_date, (SELECT max(group_no)+1 FROM board ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY), #{order_no}, #{depth}, #{no})
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.name FROM board a, user b WHERE a.no = b.no ORDER BY group_no DESC, order_no ASC
SELECT a.*,b.name FROM board a, user b WHERE a.no = b.no AND board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET order_no = order_no+1 WHERE order_no > #{group_no}
update board SET reg_date = '9999-01-01 11:11:11' where board_no = #{board_no};
UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE board_no=#{board_no}
